name: TouchMagix
tag_list: interactive-floor, interactive-wall, interactive-window, interactive-projection-surfaces, touch-table, touch-window, touch-screen-
overview:
TouchMagix is a next gen digital technology company that engages consumers in a whole new experience that involves unforgettable interaction. TouchMagix offers a new variety of interactive display solutions like Interactive Floor, Interactive Wall, Touch Table (Interactive Table), Touch Window and 3D MagixSense that will attract audience to experience interactive content in the most memorable way.

Unlike other technologies available today, TouchMagix combines an advanced optical hardware sensor called: MagixSenseâ„¢ together with sophisticated movement recognition software that interprets the user interaction into high resolution events on the display. TouchMagix also provides Free SDK & Creative Suite for designing content and special effects on various multi touch platforms.

TouchMagix was recently awarded as the best upcoming companies in India at Proto.in 2009 conference.
